Articles.Content: I have an older tv that can't adjust aspect ratio so the only way I can't cant tell is issue is by changing the aspect ratio of the HUD in game, there's only UI scale which doesn't help, and there's no visible aspect ratio settings anywhere! Help or please add, I really would like to play this game.
Yes, the option of adjusting the aspect ratio is definitely needed.
At the main menu, select settings and adjust the aspect ratio. This may leave a border around the game screen, but you'll be able to see everything.
